title: Wear Run Pro
summary: A wear only running session tracker that records your running session stats.

descriptionHTML:
A running tracker app for Android wear devices that does not require a phone.



This app measures, records, and displays/graphs your running average speed, distance, duration, and number steps per running session.


Note: The data from the free version of the app will not be imported to the pro version.

Difference From Free Version
- Year, Month, and Week progress graphs for distance, duration, steps, and avg. speed.


Important: Two users have reported that the app crashes constantly, when this happens please report the error through the dialog so I can see exactly what is wrong and fix it asap. Also please do not rate based on this error since I already know about the issue and you were warned, thank you.

Notes:
- The watch must not be muted for the running session notification to be displayed.

- Close the app after starting it by sliding it off to the right.

- The speed displayed while running is your avg speed for the session NOT your present speed.

- It is important that you set the step length as accurately as possible to your own to get more accurate results.

- You need at least two sessions to start seeing a graph.


Watch image generated with: http://www.wear-generator.com/index.html under http://creativecommons.org/licenses/by/3.0/

THE SOFTWARE IS PROVIDED "AS IS", WITHOUT WARRANTY OF ANY KIND, EXPRESS OR IMPLIED, INCLUDING BUT NOT LIMITED TO THE WARRANTIES OF MERCHANTABILITY, FITNESS FOR A PARTICULAR PURPOSE AND NONINFRINGEMENT. IN NO EVENT SHALL THE AUTHORS OR COPYRIGHT HOLDERS BE LIABLE FOR ANY CLAIM, DAMAGES OR OTHER LIABILITY, WHETHER IN AN ACTION OF CONTRACT, TORT OR OTHERWISE, ARISING FROM, OUT OF OR IN CONNECTION WITH THE SOFTWARE OR THE USE OR OTHER DEALINGS IN THE SOFTWARE.
comments: Awesome! Love the app. So simple. Let me share on social media and take my dollars. No more running with a Note 4 in my pocket.
Needs voice support Please add "Start a run" voice command support and app integration (Nike Run, S Health, Google Fit,  Moto Body). Otherwise nice alternative to no GPS on my Moto 360!
Almost complete It would be integrate heartrate feature to notify runner if heartrate reach high. Also sync to google fit.
Almost perfect We need an integration with Google fit and other record running apps, like Nike+...
recentChanges: - Motorola 360 fix (used to display blank screen).
- Translated most text from English to: German, Spanish, French, Italian, Korean, and Russian.
- A big thank you to the users who use these languages.
- Fixed issue where application would open more than once when started from notification.
- Fixed issue where minimum value would show as zero even when it was not zero in the graphs.
